column5: Private home on 18 acres. Perfect for fishermen -- secure boat parking, washing, and motor flush. Hike our 3/4 mile nature trail through a live oak forest and enjoy the sites of red-tailed hawks, hummingbirds,white-tailed deer, migratory birds, ducks, sand hill cranes, feral hogs, and an abundant assortment of native plants and vegetation. BBQ outside at your tree-shaded sitting area.
